title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
description: Management of applications in PHP and Angular language
Creation of RESTful API in php and node js
Improving the frontend of the applications with css and bootstrap
Collaborated with a team of engineers to develop and implement software solutions for various projects
Designed and implemented efficient algorithms to solve complex technical challenges, resulting in improved system performance and reduced development time
Utilized Php, Node js and Angular to develop software applications, ensuring high quality and adherence to coding standards.

title: FULL STACK SUPPORT ENGINEER
description: Management of microservices with Java Spring boot, which controlled the status changes of the invoices managed by the company, it was linked to the database and in turn consumed different external API rest and soap services
Validation of the rest and soap API services when errors were generated when processing invoices, which is why request validations were carried out to find the consumption failure
Management of relational and non-relational databases with MySql and Oracle to manage personal information of clients and Mongodb to invoice statuses and information
Deployment of company products to customers
